response.overview: In a Europe devastated by the Black Death, Andruccio leaves Coccorone to embark on a journey to Triora, the "village of witches." With an enigmatic companion by his side, he ventures into a world suspended between reality and nightmare.
response.tagline: In plague-ravaged Europe, Andruccio journeys to Triora, the "village of witches," where reality blurs into nightmare.
response.title: x
